full_text:
FYI - here's what I sent my boss

Reporter: [b)(6), (b)(7)(C)] ABC
Question:
This is [b)(6), (b)(7)(C)] at ABC News in New York. We are told there might have been a suicide at MCC in the last several days. Is that accurate? Has there been a death at your facility since the death of Jeffrey Epstein?

Proposed Response: [b)(5)]

Internal Notes: [b)(5), (b)(6), (b)(7)(B)]

[b)(6), (b)(7)(C)]
Public Information Office
Federal Bureau of Prisons
(202) 353-4464
>>> [b)(6), (b)(7)(C)] @abc.com> 8/27/2019 10:38 AM >>>
This is [b)(6), (b)(7)(C)] at ABC News in New York. We are told there might have been a suicide at MCC in the last several days. Is that accurate? Has there been a death at your facility since the death of Jeffrey Epstein?

Thank you.

Senior Investigative Reporter
47 West 66th Street / New York, New York / 10023
Office: 212.456[b)(6)] / Cell: 646.484[b)(6)] Twitter: [b)(6), (b)(7)(C)]

Page 5107
DOJ-OGR-00024394

additional_notes: The document contains multiple redactions, indicated by [b)(6)], [b)(7)(C)], and [b)(5)]. The content appears to be an email or inquiry response related to a query about a potential suicide at MCC and the death of Jeffrey Epstein.
